00017 int main(int argc, char ** argv ) {

00019   char bFile[50];

00022   PetscInitialize(&argc,&argv,0,NULL);
00023   ot::RegisterEvents();
00024 
00025   if(argc < 2) {
00026     std::cerr << "Usage: " << argv[0] << "inpfile " << std::endl;
00027     return -1;

00030   MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD,&size);

00032   sprintf(bFile,"%s%d_%d.ot",argv[1],rank,size);
00033 
00034   if(!rank){
00035     std::cout << " reading  "<<bFile<<std::endl; // Point size
00036   }
00037   std::vector<ot::TreeNode> balOct;
00038   ot::readNodesFromFile (bFile,balOct);
00039 
00040   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00041 
00042   if(!rank){
00043     std::cout << " finished reading  "<<bFile<<std::endl; // Point size
00044   }
00045 
00046   // compute total inp size and output size
00047   locSz = balOct.size();
00048   par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&locSz, &totalSz, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00049 
00050   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00051   if(!rank) {
00052     std::cout << "# of Balanced Octants: "<< totalSz << std::endl;       
00053   }
00054 
00055   //ODA ...
00056   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00057 
00058   assert(!(balOct.empty()));
00059   ot::DA da(balOct,MPI_COMM_WORLD, MPI_COMM_WORLD, false,NULL,NULL);
00060 
00061   balOct.clear();
00062 
00063   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00064 
00065   if(!rank) {
00066     std::cout << "Finished Meshing "<< std::endl;

00069   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00070 
00071   unsigned int maxDepth = (da.getMaxDepth()-1);
00072 
00073   //ComputeLocalToGlobalElemMappings
00074   if( !(da.computedLocalToGlobalElems()) ) {
00075     da.computeLocalToGlobalElemMappings();
00076   }
00077 
00078   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00079 
00080   if(!rank) {
00081     std::cout << "Computed Local To Global (Nodes) Maps "<< std::endl;

00083 
00084   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00085

00088     da.computeLocalToGlobalMappings();
00089   }
00090 
00091   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00092 
00093   if(!rank) {
00094     std::cout << "Computed Local To Global (Elements) Maps "<< std::endl;

00098     std::cout << "Dumping Mesh... "<< std::endl;       
00099   }

00101   DendroIntL* localToGlobalMap = da.getLocalToGlobalMap();
00102   DendroIntL* localToGlobalElemsMap = da.getLocalToGlobalElemsMap();
00103 
00104   unsigned int localElemSize = da.getElementSize();
00105   unsigned int localNodeSize = da.getNodeSize();
00106 
00107   std::vector<char> nodeVisited;
00108   da.createVector<char>(nodeVisited, false, false, 1);
00109 
00110   //Initialize
00111   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < nodeVisited.size(); i++) {
00112     nodeVisited[i] = 0;
00113   }
00114 
00115   char* nodeVisitedBuffer = NULL;
00116   da.vecGetBuffer<char>(nodeVisited, nodeVisitedBuffer, false, false, true, 1);

00118   unsigned int idxElemBegin = da.getIdxElementBegin();
00119   unsigned int idxPostGhostBegin = da.getIdxPostGhostBegin();

00123   FILE* outNodeListFile = fopen(nodeListFileName,"wb");
00124   fwrite((&localNodeSize), sizeof(unsigned int), 1, outNodeListFile);

00126   unsigned int nodeCnt = 0;
00127   if(da.iAmActive()) {
00128     for( da.init<ot::DA_FLAGS::ALL>(); 
00129         da.curr() < da.end<ot::DA_FLAGS::ALL>();
00130         da.next<ot::DA_FLAGS::ALL>() ) {
00131       Point currPt = da.getCurrentOffset();
00132       unsigned int Lev = da.getLevel(da.curr());
00133       unsigned int xCurr = currPt.xint();
00134       unsigned int yCurr = currPt.yint();
00135       unsigned int zCurr = currPt.zint();
00136 
00137       ot::TreeNode current(xCurr, yCurr, zCurr, Lev, 3, (maxDepth+1));
00138       ot::TreeNode parent = current.getParent();
00139 
00140       unsigned char hnType = da.getHangingNodeIndex(da.curr());
00141       unsigned int xyz[8][3];
00142 
00143       //node 0
00144       if(hnType & (1 << 0)) {
00145         xyz[0][0] = parent.minX();
00146         xyz[0][1] = parent.minY();
00147         xyz[0][2] = parent.minZ();
00148       } else {
00149         xyz[0][0] = current.minX();
00150         xyz[0][1] = current.minY();
00151         xyz[0][2] = current.minZ();
00152       }
00153 
00154       //node 1
00155       if(hnType & (1 << 1)) {
00156         xyz[1][0] = parent.maxX();
00157         xyz[1][1] = parent.minY();
00158         xyz[1][2] = parent.minZ();
00159       } else {
00160         xyz[1][0] = current.maxX();
00161         xyz[1][1] = current.minY();
00162         xyz[1][2] = current.minZ();
00163       }
00164 
00165       //node 2
00166       if(hnType & (1 << 2)) {
00167         xyz[2][0] = parent.minX();
00168         xyz[2][1] = parent.maxY();
00169         xyz[2][2] = parent.minZ();
00170       } else {
00171         xyz[2][0] = current.minX();
00172         xyz[2][1] = current.maxY();
00173         xyz[2][2] = current.minZ();
00174       }
00175 
00176       //node 3
00177       if(hnType & (1 << 3)) {
00178         xyz[3][0] = parent.maxX();
00179         xyz[3][1] = parent.maxY();
00180         xyz[3][2] = parent.minZ();
00181       } else {
00182         xyz[3][0] = current.maxX();

00184         xyz[3][2] = current.minZ();

00188       if(hnType & (1 << 4)) {

00191         xyz[4][2] = parent.maxZ();
00192       } else {

00194         xyz[4][1] = current.minY();

00212         xyz[6][1] = parent.maxY();
00213         xyz[6][2] = parent.maxZ();

00223         xyz[7][1] = parent.maxY();
00224         xyz[7][2] = parent.maxZ();
00225       } else {
00226         xyz[7][0] = current.maxX();
00227         xyz[7][1] = current.maxY();
00228         xyz[7][2] = current.maxZ();
00229       }
00230 
00231       unsigned int indices[8];
00232       da.getNodeIndices(indices);
00233 
00234       for(unsigned int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
00235         if( (indices[j] >= idxElemBegin) && (indices[j] < idxPostGhostBegin) &&
00236             (nodeVisitedBuffer[indices[j]] == 0) ) {
00237           fwrite(xyz[j], sizeof(unsigned int), 3,  outNodeListFile);
00238           fwrite((&(localToGlobalMap[indices[j]])), sizeof(DendroIntL), 1, outNodeListFile);
00239           nodeVisitedBuffer[indices[j]] = 1;
00240           nodeCnt++;
00241         }
00242       }//end for j
00243     }//end loop
00244   }//end if active
00245 
00246   da.vecRestoreBuffer<char>(nodeVisited, nodeVisitedBuffer, false, false, true, 1);
00247   nodeVisited.clear();
00248 
00249   assert(nodeCnt == localNodeSize);
00250   fclose(outNodeListFile);
00251 
00252   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00253   if(!rank) {
00254     std::cout<<"Finished Writing Node List."<<std::endl;
00255   }
00256   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00257 
00258 
00259   char elemListFileName[100];
00260   sprintf(elemListFileName,"%s_EL_%d_%d.out",argv[1],rank,size);
00261   FILE* outElemListFile = fopen(elemListFileName,"wb");
00262   fwrite(&maxDepth, sizeof(unsigned int), 1, outElemListFile);
00263   fwrite(&localElemSize, sizeof(unsigned int), 1, outElemListFile);
00264 
00265   unsigned int writableCnt = 0;
00266   if(da.iAmActive()) {
00267     for( da.init<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>(); da.curr() < da.end<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>(); da.next<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>() ) {
00268       Point currPt = da.getCurrentOffset();
00269       DendroIntL xyzdi[5];
00270       xyzdi[0] = currPt.xint();
00271       xyzdi[1] = currPt.yint();
00272       xyzdi[2] = currPt.zint();
00273       xyzdi[3] = ( (da.getLevel(da.curr())) - 1 );
00274       xyzdi[4] = localToGlobalElemsMap[da.curr()];
00275 
00276       fwrite(xyzdi, sizeof(DendroIntL), 5, outElemListFile);
00277 
00278       writableCnt++; 
00279     }
00280   }
00281 
00282   assert(writableCnt == localElemSize); 
00283   fclose(outElemListFile);
00284 
00285   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00286   if(!rank) {
00287     std::cout<<"Finished Writing Element List."<<std::endl;
00288   }
00289   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);

00291   char meshFileName[100];
00292   sprintf(meshFileName,"%s_M_%d_%d.out",argv[1],rank,size);
00293   FILE* outMeshFile = fopen(meshFileName,"wb");
00294   fwrite(&localElemSize, sizeof(unsigned int), 1, outMeshFile);
00295 
00296   if(da.iAmActive()) {
00297     for( da.init<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>();
00298         da.curr() < da.end<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>();
00299         da.next<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>() ) {
00300       unsigned int indices[8];
00301       da.getNodeIndices(indices);
00302 
00303       DendroIntL record[9];
00304       record[0] = localToGlobalElemsMap[da.curr()];
00305 
00306       for(unsigned int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
00307         record[j+1] = localToGlobalMap[indices[j]];
00308       }
00309 
00310       fwrite(record, sizeof(DendroIntL), 9, outMeshFile);
00311

00313     }

00321   }
